name: Call of Duty®: Advanced Warfare - Extra Armory Slots 4
detailed_description: The Extra Armory Slots pack adds 120 extra armory slots to increase the number of items that can be stored in the redeemable loot section of your armory, giving you extra armory slots to store additional Weapon Loot and Character Gear.
about_the_game: The Extra Armory Slots pack adds 120 extra armory slots to increase the number of items that can be stored in the redeemable loot section of your armory, giving you extra armory slots to store additional Weapon Loot and Character Gear.
short_description: The Extra Armory Slots pack adds 120 extra armory slots to increase the number of items that can be stored in the redeemable loot section of your armory, giving you extra armory slots to store additional Weapon Loot and Character Gear.

fullgame.name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Multiplayer

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit
  • 处理器: Intel® Core™ i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom™ II X4 810 @ 2.60 GHz
  • 内存: 6 GB RAM
  • 图形: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTS 450 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 5870 @ 1GB
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间
  • 声卡: DirectX Compatible
  • 附注事项: Field of View ranges from 65°-90°.
